metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11139 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has double free vulnerabilities in theReadOneJNGImage() function in coders/png.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-2').
